title: Cooper Kupp on the Super Bowl, His Contract Extension, and More. Plus, the Latest NFL News.
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Steven are joined by Super Bowl MVP Cooper Kupp to discuss his contract extension, Sean McVay, the Super Bowl, and what he wants to work on during the upcoming season. Then they discuss the latest NFL news.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
